text: pinne a bijatte nam oru bhrunamayi rupappetutti. anantaram a bhrunatte nam oru mansapindamayi rupappetutti. tutarnn nam a mansapindatte asthikutamayi rupappetutti. ennitt nam asthikutatte mansam keant peatinnu. pinnit marrearu srstiyayi nam avane valarttiyetuttu. appeal erravum nalla srstikarttavaya allahu anugrahapurnnanayirikkunnu
